summary: Build a one-page website for the cafe Maddys Latavola (Mussoorie, Uttarakhand, India) using only the cafe’s own menu and details, including cafe photos and the provided phone numbers, with no extra changes.
architectural_notes: Site must be a single-page layout.
Menu content must be sourced only from the cafe’s own website; do not supplement from other sources.
Do not introduce extra changes or additional content beyond provided/official cafe info.
Menu section content should reflect the user-provided menu, replacing any previously provided menu content.

existing_features.title: Build a single-page cafe website for “Maddys Latavola” located in Mussoorie, Uttarakhand, India, and ensure all visible business details match the user-provided info (name, location, phone numbers) without substituting details from other sources.
Add a Menu section whose items/prices/content are taken only from Maddys Latavola’s own official menu as provided on the cafe’s website (no third-party menu sources and no invented items).

Add a Photos/Gallery section that uses only photos of Maddys Latavola sourced from the provided Google Maps link, or other official cafe-controlled sources, and do not add stock images or unrelated cafe imagery.
Add a Contact section that prominently displays both phone numbers and provides click-to-call links.

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and section layout) appropriate for a cafe one-page site, and use it consistently across the page (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).

Replace the current Menu section data source with menu items, categories, variants, and prices taken strictly from the 12 user-uploaded menu screenshots (the screenshots are the single source of truth for menu content). Remove all currently hardcoded/invented menu content in frontend/src/content/menu.ts.

Update the Menu section UI (frontend/src/components/MenuSection.tsx) to correctly render the new menu structure from the screenshots, including support for multi-price variants (e.g., Half/Full and Medium/Large) and Veg/Non-Veg indicators, while keeping the existing accordion-based layout.

Add the 12 user-uploaded menu screenshots as static assets in the frontend and provide an optional in-page way for users to view the original menu images (e.g., a "View menu images" button that opens a modal/gallery). Use the exact uploaded filenames.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a one-page cafe website for Maddys Latavola (Mussoorie, Uttarakhand, India) including cafe photos, phone numbers (9997818704, 9756327900), and the menu sourced only from the cafe’s own website (no additional changes/content).
Replace the currently provided Menu section content with the menu the user wants to use instead (use the user-provided menu as the source of truth).
